sample-data.title: Concatenated sequence data
sample-data.description: Per sample reads concatenated in a single FASTQ file.

results-summary.title: Results summaries
results-summary.description: Results summaries including adapter configuration numbers.

gene-expression-processed.title: Processed gene expression counts
gene-expression-processed.description: Filtered and normalized gene x cell expression matrix.

transcript-expression-processed.title: Processed transcript expression counts
transcript-expression-processed.description: Filtered and normalized transcript x cell expression matrix.

mitochondrial-expression.title: Mitochondrial expression levels
mitochondrial-expression.description: Per cell mitochondrial gene expression as percentage total of total gene expression.

read-tags.title: Read summary
read-tags.description: Per read assigned barcodes UMIs genes and transcripts.

barcode-counts.title: Barcode counts
barcode-counts.description: The counts of each barcode present in the sequenced library (only barcodes that have a 100% match in the 10x whitelist are included).

whitelist.title: Whitelist
whitelist.description: The barcodes found in the library that remain after filtering.

transcriptome_fasta.title: Transcriptome sequence
transcriptome_fasta.description: Transcriptome generated by Stringtie during transcript discovery stage

transcriptome_annotation.title: Transcriptome annotation
transcriptome_annotation.description: Transcriptome annotation generated by Stringtie during transcript discovery stage
